title: France recognises state of Palestine, Emmanuel Macron tells UN general assembly – Middle East crisis live
summary: The French president announced key developments during an official address. Former President Trump is set to participate in crucial meetings with leaders from Ukraine, the European Union, and various Middle Eastern countries on Tuesday. These high-stakes discussions are expected to address pressing international issues.

title: Ballon d’Or 2025: Wiegman and Hampton win prizes, main player awards to come – live
summary: In Paris, England's duo secured accolades as the best goalkeeper and manager at a prestigious award ceremony. The event highlights their outstanding achievements in football. Michael Butler will provide continuous updates on the proceedings.

title: Jimmy Kimmel will return to TV after highly criticized suspension
summary: A late-night host has been reinstated following a brief suspension due to remarks about MAGA and Charlie Kirk, which Disney deemed "insensitive." The comments sparked controversy, leading to the host's temporary removal. The decision to reinstate reflects the ongoing tension between media personalities and corporate sensitivity.

title: Trump due to make announcement about autism – US politics live
summary: The President is set to hold a media briefing soon amid reports that the administration plans to associate Tylenol (acetaminophen) with autism. This potential link is causing concern and anticipation among health experts and the public. Further details are expected to be revealed during the address.
